name: WhiteBloodCellsCountBands
title: White blood cells count bands
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab tests commonly used for a blood, serum or plasma white blood cells count bands test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood, serum or plasma for white blood cells bands. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Laboratory Test category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include LOINC White blood cells count bands lab tests using the source of blood, serum or plasma with a reporting scale of percentage.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
